title: How I’m Using ChatGPT for My Career Pivot
blurb: Leveraging tools like ChatGPT can make the transition from military to tech more focused and strategic. Here’s how I’m using it to refine my goals, map out certification paths, and clarify next steps during my pivot.
content: In this post, I break down how I’ve used ChatGPT Pro to structure my transition: career goal refinement, certification planning, and job search prioritization...
